doc.title: Hitler: The Unknown Soldier 1914-1918
doc.plot: A historic film that edits together many sources of information on Adolf Hitler's foot soldier combat experience in the German army in World War I. Contains original German, British and German war time film footage, in addition to excerpts from Hitler's letters home from the front. Bonus footage contains a slide show of German WWI postcards and an interview with Professor Ian Kershaw, the foremost academic authority on the life of the dictator.
